name: 王多柏
objective:
Designed for low-voltage, low-energy RF and millimeter-wave integrated circuits:
Low voltage, low energy consumption radio frequency millimeter wave front-end circuit
Low voltage, low energy consumption and low noise RF and millimeter wave amplifier
Low voltage, low energy consumption RF and millimeter wave mixer
Low voltage, low energy consumption RF and millimeter wave voltage controlled oscillator
schedule:
1: Introduction to RF and mmWave communication system (one week)
2: Basic Concepts in RF Design (one to two week)
3: Transceiver Architectures (one week)
4: Two-Port Network (one week)
5: Matching Network (one week)
6: Low-Noise Amplifiers (one week)
7: Simulation with Spectre RF: LNA and Low-Voltage LNA (two weeks)
8: Mixers (one week)
9: Simulation with Spectre RF: Mixer and Low-Voltage Mixer (two weeks)
10: Voltage-Controlled Oscillators (one week)
11: Simulation with Spectre RF: VCO and Low-Voltage VCO (two weeks)
12. Paper Studying
materials:
1. Handouts
2. Papers
3. Microwave Transistor Amplifiers: Analysis and Design, 2/E, Guillermo Gonzalez
4. RF Microelectronics, Razavi
